page.title: 17Population of Great Coxwell
page.content: There is a total population of about 340 people in the area. There are at least 16 widows and 9 widowers,some of whom have married again.There are about 8 one-person households. The housing consists of 14 Council Houses,three of which have been sold to the tenants,some 8 National Trust tenancies,three private lettings.About 75% are owner occupied. There are about 34 pensioners(old age and invalidity).37 people are below the age of thirteen,30 are teenagers and the remainder are between twenty and sixty(the pensionable age for women) or sixty-five(the pensionable age for men).
